OOC: Okay time to move forward on this thread, I think I have waited a
suitable amount of time. .

BIC:

Deepstryke, Phobia, Tumult, Decibel, Nightstrike and Darkfate shot
through the skies, their jets lighting up the air as the ground seemed
to roll beneath them. First it was the greens and sandy browns of their
small island retreat, and then it became the ever present and pristine
azure blues of the oceans. Eventually this gave way to the varying hues
of browns, oranges and greens of land as they cut through the skies
over it, birds scattering in alarm at the thunderclap of their passing!

Finally though in the distance a mountain can be seen, one that grew
swiftly larger as they approached. Beneath the moving vehicles the
ground grew more and more rocky and course as they approached their
goal. Even as they drew ever closer the view of the aft end of a ship
could be made out, poking out of the side of mountain. 

Continuing on their approach Decibel gleefully launched forward, her
jets not only brightening but also becoming louder as she pushed them
hard and fast. She wanted to be first to reach the goal and she wasn�t
going to let anything stand in her way. 

The others of course followed suit, pushing their engines to the limit.
Finally the distance to the goal shrank from miles to meters as they
sped in, weapons going hot, cannons ready to rip into the seemingly
vulnerable ark!! 

**CCRRAAKKTHOOOM!!**

Just as they came into range a rather large coruscating beam fired out
from the ground below, just within the confines of the ark. The beam
was intense as it cut into the incoming minions! 

With the unerring aim it caught Deepstryke near dead center; shards of
metal and armor were ripped from his form. It was only his internal
fortitude and the insane amounts of armor that he possessed that
stopped him from going into immediate stasis lock. As it was his
smoking form trailed from the skies as he spun towards the ground.
�Minions attack �. � he commanded weakly as he fell to the ground.

Below a black futuristic tank with crimson highlights hovered out into
view. Quickly it shifted form and looked upward, its form and visage
disturbingly familiar to those who know their history. The cyclopean
gaze, the right arm sporting dual mounted cannons, the left arm that IS
a cannon. Despite the color changes it looked like SHOCKBLAST!! 

Who ever it is, it stood below them, and began to fire upwards at the
incoming minion!

(Tag Darkfate & Nightstrike)

OOC: I would assume that the Autobots/Maximals have some sort of alarm
system here at the ark, since on the show they did do a lot to guard
it?? If they do then it began to go off, and then abruptly stopped!
